Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to provide for the operation and maintenance of certain fish propagation facilities constructed in the Columbia River Basin, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Bonneville Power Administration (the BPA) to transfer, for FY 1985 and each succeeding fiscal year, from the BPA Fund to the Secretary of Commerce an amount sufficient to pay the cost of operating and maintaining the BPA system of fish propagation facilities.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the operation and maintenance of certain fish propagation facilities constructed in the Columbia River Basin, and for other purposes.
